cards.heading: Eyes up, horn ready
cards.body: Pedestrians, blind corners, intersections: slow down and sound horn. Always yield to people.

cards.heading: Floor & overhead
cards.body: Spills, debris, low pipes, damaged racking. Stop if unsure and report hazards immediately.

cards.heading: Load integrity
cards.body: No leaning stacks, loose bands, or tilted pallets. Secure loads before moving.

cards.heading: Speed zones
cards.body: Reduce speed in narrow aisles, ramps, and high-traffic areas. Maintain control always.

cards.heading: Battery safety
cards.body: Charging areas require PPE and proper ventilation. Follow electrical safety protocols.

cards.heading: When in doubt, stop
cards.body: Tag out unsafe conditions. Report hazards to supervision. Safety first, always.
